case_vignette: A 57-year-old man comes to the phys   ician because of a 3-week history of abdominal bloating and increased frequency of stools. He describes the stools as bulky,    foul-sme   lling, and difficult to flush. He als o has a 4-month hi   story of recurrent dull upper abdominal  pain that usually lasts for a few days, worsens after meals, and is not relieved with ant   acids. He has had a 10-kg (22-lb) weight loss  in the past 4 months. He has no personal or family history of serious illness. He has smoked 1 pack of ci   gare  ttes daily for 37 years. He has a 12-year hist   ory of drinking 6 to 8 beers daily. He is 1  60 cm (5 ft 3 in) tall and weighs 52 kg (115 lb); BMI    is 20 kg  /m2. His vital signs are within normal limits. Abdominal    e xamination shows mild epigastric tenderness without rebound or guarding. Bowel sounds are normal. The remainder of the exa mination shows no abnormalities.

Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?

I've been experiencing abdominal bloating and an increased frequency of stools that are bulky, foul-smelling, and difficult to flush. I also have recurrent dull upper abdominal pain that worsens after meals and is not relieved with antacids.
How long have you been experiencing these symptoms?
I've been experiencing the abdominal bloating and change in stools for 3 weeks, and the recurrent abdominal pain for about 4 months.
Have you experienced any recent weight loss or changes in appetite?
Yes, I have lost 10 kg (22 lbs) in the past 4 months.
Do you have any family history of gastrointestinal diseases or any other relevant medical conditions?
No, I do not have any personal or family history of serious illness.
Are you currently taking any medications or supplements?
You didn’t mention any medications or supplements in the information you provided, so based on that, I am not taking any medications or supplements.
Do you have any history of excessive alcohol consumption or have you recently traveled internationally?
Yes, I have a history of drinking 6 to 8 beers daily for the past 12 years. I haven't mentioned any recent international travel.
Final Diagnosis: Chronic Pancreatitis
